update rank_accept_award
acceptdate = #{acceptdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
confirmacceptdate = #{confirmacceptdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reciverusername = #{reciverusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reciverusertel = #{reciverusertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reciveruseraddr = #{reciveruseraddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logisticscompany = #{logisticscompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logisticsnum = #{logisticsnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dispatchdate = #{dispatchdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarker = #{remarker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handleuserid = #{handleuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publishawardtype = #{publishawardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rank_accept_award set rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, acceptdate = #{acceptdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, confirmacceptdate = #{confirmacceptdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, awardlevel = #{awardlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, awardid = #{awardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reciverusername = #{reciverusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reciverusertel = #{reciverusertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reciveruseraddr = #{reciveruseraddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logisticscompany = #{logisticscompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logisticsnum = #{logisticsnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dispatchdate = #{dispatchdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarker = #{remarker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handleuserid = #{handleuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from rank_accept_award inner join rank on rank_accept_award.rankid = rank.rankid where rank.isfinish = 5 and rank_accept_award.userid = #{userid} order by rank_accept_award.createdate desc limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from rank_accept_award inner join rank on rank_accept_award.rankid = rank.rankid where rank.isfinish = 5 and rank_accept_award.userid = #{userid}
